hero.subtitle: The ultimate quiz of the Greek political spectrum

about.title: About
about.paragraph: GreekValues is a quiz that aims to identify your position on the Greek political spectrum. A statement will be presented to you and you will answer with your opinion on the statement. Answers are multiple-choice and slightly affect your score. At the end of the quiz, your answers will be compared to the maximum possible score for each value, thus giving you a percentage. If you have any suggestions or constructive criticism you may open an issue on Github.

values.question: What are the values?
values.answer: There are currently seven axes, each of which has two opposing values. They are:
